BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-XMAS
BundleInfo.Author: Scheltema Lab
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Analyze and visualize crosslinking mass spectrometry data in a structural context
BundleInfo.Description: XMAS - or Cross(X)link Mapping and AnalySis - aligns the sequences of crosslinked peptides from crosslinking mass spectrometry (XL-MS) data to the sequences of structural models, thereby obtaining crosslinked positions. These crosslinks are mapped and displayed as pseudobond models. XMAS features tools for visualization, analysis, and data handling, providing insight into reproducibility and reliability of XL-MS data. It also enables XL-MS-based evaluation of theoretical structural models, as well as integration with DisVis and HADDOCK for integrative modelling.
